topComments.author: Becki
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Dia inteiro incr√≠vel para toda a fam√≠lia! Esteve l√° das 10 da manh√£ at√© pelo menos 4. Vale a pena cada $$$ definitivamente voltaria novamente!!!  O ingresso inclui uma refei√ß√£o gratuita e 1 bebida gelada (bebida alco√≥lica, se preferir). A √°rea de churrasco para a refei√ß√£o abre em cerca de meia hora, voc√™ pode obter hamb√∫rguer de bife Angus, costeletas de porco, salsicha e batatas. No entanto, pagamos mais e fomos passear a cavalo por meia hora, quando chegamos √† √°rea da churrasqueira eles pararam de cozinhar os hamb√∫rgueres Angus e n√£o gostamos de costeletas de porco. Eles foram muito agrad√°veis, acomodando nossas necessidades e eles nos fizeram hamb√∫rguer de frango e batatas fritas frescas em vez disso!  H√° alguns shows durante o dia, um ato de m√°gica, pe√ßas de cowboys e √≠ndios nas ruas que o cercam, um show de encantadores de cavalos, um tiroteio de cowboys / dan√ßa e um ato de palha√ßo. Esteja ciente de que a maioria deles escolhe pessoas da plat√©ia para participar!!!  Tema ocidental em todo o parque, leva voc√™ de volta no tempo. Grande divers√£o para crian√ßas e adultos. Muitos se fantasiavam de vaqueiros e √≠ndios, principalmente as crian√ßas. Eles t√™m uma grande loja de souvenirs que voc√™ pode se equipar a um pre√ßo! Eles tamb√©m t√™m ra√ß√£o para animais de fazenda que voc√™ pode comprar para alimentar as cabras e o porquinho!  No geral, √≥timo dia e algo diferente para experimentar :)  (Original) Amazing full day out for all the family! Was there from 10am until at least 4. Well worth every ¬£¬£¬£ definitely  go again!!!  Ticket admission includes a free meal and 1 cold beverage (alcoholic drink if preferred). The bbq area for the meal opens on around half 1, you can get Angus steak burger, pork chops, sausage, & potatoes. However we paid extra and went on a horse ride for half an hour, the by the time we got to the grill area they had stopped cooking the Angus burgers and we don‚Äôt like pork chops. They were very pleasant, accommodating our needs and n they made us chicken burger and chips fresh instead!  There are a few shows in the day, a magic act, cowboy& Indians play set in the streets that surround you, a horse whisperer show, a cowboys shoot off/ dancing & a clown act. Be aware that most of these they pick people from the audience to participate in!!!  Western themed around the whole park, takes you back in time. Great fun for kids and adults alike. Many dressed up as cowboys and Indians especially the kids. They have a great souvenir shop that you can kit yourself out in at a price! They also have farm animal feed that you can buy to feed the goats and baby pig with!  Overall great day out & something different to experience :)

topComments.author: Jaka Gaber
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) No come√ßo eu pensei que o parque ia ser chato e bastante lucrativo, mas cara, eu estava errado. Os shows s√£o incr√≠veis!!  Eu viajei para l√° no domingo, ent√£o vi o assalto ao banco e o show do sal√£o. Ent√£o, para come√ßar, vale a pena visitar cedo ‚Äì por volta das 11h para n√£o perder os shows.  O show de assalto a banco √© bastante surpreendente. Os atores fazem um √≥timo trabalho. O estrondo de armas, galopes r√°pidos de cavalos e gritos altos. Voc√™ realmente sente que viajou de volta no tempo para o oeste selvagem. Al√©m disso, a hist√≥ria do show te arrasta como um filme - todos os visitantes riem durante o show - √≥timos momentos (:  O show do sal√£o tamb√©m √© √≥timo e divertido, porque os atores tamb√©m incluem os visitantes - muito divertido. (Original) At first I thought the park was going to be boring and quite money grabing, but man was I wrong. The shows are amazing!!  I traveled there on sunday so I saw the bank robbery and the saloon show. So to begin, it is worth to visit early - around 11 am so you don't miss the shows.  The bank robbery show is quite amazing. The actors do a great job. The loud bangs of guns, fast gallops of horses and loud shouting. You really feel like you traveled back in time to wild west. Also the story of the show drags you in like a movie - the whole lot of visitors laugh during the show - so great times (:  The saloon show is also great and entertaining, because actors include the visitors in it too - great fun.  The actors are all kind and you can see they enjoy their job so you feel also welcome in the theme park.  Also got some amazing photos I am sharing below so I must say I really had fun!!
